songs.title: This Song Goes in a Loop Dee Loop
songs.lyrics:
[Rebecca Bunch, spoken]
Okay. So, to refresh, it goes —

[Rebecca Bunch, sung, spoken]
This song goes in a loop de loop!
It starts at the end
And it ends at the start of...
This song goes in a loop-de-loop!

Do you like it? I made it up in the shower this morning. I really think it could be the new "John Jacob Jingleheimer Schmidt"!

Okay, do you want to try it with me?

This song goes in a loop de loop...

[Paula Proctor, sung]
I think I need a noose de noose!

[Rebecca Bunch, spoken]
Hahaha, Paula! You put your own spin on it, and that's fun!
